content.description: Start just right of the diagonal crack and climb straight up to the top
content.location: About 25 feet to the left of  the 5'' crack Finny.

content.description: A right facing corner leads to a 3 foot wide ledge, step left and continue straight up crossing the diagonal crack.
content.location: 8 feet to the left of the start of the diagonal crack.

content.description: Climb straight up to the arching crack, traverse right a few feet until you can power up to the short crack system that leads to the top of the cliff.
content.protection: No pro for the first half (crux)
content.location: On the left end of the clean face in between On Leash and Finny.

content.description: A diagonal crack that rises to the top up left at about 45 Degrees.
content.location: 27 feet left of the 5 inch crack , Finny.

content.description: Four feet left, there is a shelf 6 feet above the ground with a small ceiling and an overhanging face above it. Climb the face than continue straight up to the top.
content.location: 4 Feet left of the left facing corner.

content.description: Start in the left facing corner at the left end of the three foot wide ledge. From the ledge, climb slightly left, following a short vertical crack to a right facing corner and straight up to the top.
Start between the diagonal crack and the right facing corner and  climb straight up to a small left facing corner that is 6 feet below the top.
content.location: Just left of The large feet leaning crack of ''On Leash''

content.description:
Start at a vertical crack which bends to the right 6 feet above the ground and leads right to a good ledge. At the right end of the ledge climb straight up to the top. 

   TKO variation: 5.5. Start below the shelf 10 feet to the right,(same start as Lucy O) climb left to a short slanting right facing corner and the ledge above. 

  Remy variation: 3 feet to the right of the start, climb a right facing corner to a one foot roof. Follow the crack above the corner to the ledge.Continue up the route.
content.protection: Regular crack start goes trad, the top is perhaps run out.
content.location: Crack starts 22 feet to the left of the start of  Lucy O.

content.description: Climb a short left facing corner to the ledge, step right five feet and follow a blocky line finishing in a left facing corner.
content.location: At the left end of the 3 foot wide ledge.

content.description: This is the dirty center section of the cliff, with the very obvious left leaning diagonal crack. All route descriptions written by Al Carilli.
